last_episode_to_air.name: Legacy
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Hollywood comes knocking, Aditya builds on his father's work with a new studio. Chopra's death shocks the industry ahead of his last film's premiere.

name: The Romantics
overview: Featuring archival footage and in-depth celebrity interviews, this docuseries celebrates the life and the legacy of Bollywood filmmaking titan Yash Chopra and his studio.

episodes.name: The Boy from Jalandhar
episodes.overview: Through Yash Chopra's rise as a filmmaker, his introduction of the Angry Youn Man and classic romantic heroes mark a shift in exciting Bollywood tropes.

episodes.name: Prodigal Son
episodes.overview: In a rare interview, Aditya Chopra recalls his early days as a director in his father's shadow, and the dazzling success of his first film.

episodes.name: The New Guard
episodes.overview: Yash Raj Films finds success as it pushes genre norms — but failures loom large. Aditya and Uday Chopra address debates around nepotism in the industry.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: As Hollywood comes knocking, Aditya builds on his father's work with a new studio. Chopra's death shocks the industry ahead of his last film's premiere.
